author: Reuters Editorial
title: No more dumb coronavirus questions, Berlin police beg
description: Am I allowed to have a hairdresser or beautician come to my home? Can I hang out with my friends outside? Can I chill with my mates at home?
content:
BERLIN (Reuters) - Am I allowed to have a hairdresser or beautician come to my home? Can I hang out with my friends outside? Can I chill with my mates at home? 
Berlin police said on Thursday their emergency phone line had been swamped with questions about t… [+607 chars]
